text:
This is only about the free to play football pitch.

The quality of the pitch is mediocre and the fences are not very high (ball can easily go into school and then it is a struggle to get it back if you don't go to school there). The grass is quite high and ground not same level.

Good thing is it is quite big (big enough for 7 aside game) and there are goals in good condition.

It is unfortunate that you have to book so far in advance but at least it makes sure you have a chance to play and train with whoever you want.
